Os tamanhos de armazenamento mostrados aqui não contam código/cache dalvik que não são importantes para o processo de backup/restauração. O aplicativo será reiniciado após a exclusão dos arquivos de backup. android.support.design.widget.AppBarLayout$ScrollingViewBehavior Papéis de parede aplicados Backup the currently applied wallpaper(s) to local or cloud storage. Apply Apply externally Apps Apps + Data Installed apps with newer backups Ascending Attention Audio Available Back Back to the safe zone Backed up Backed up apps Backing up Backing up and syncing Backing up data Backup Backup all Backup and storage Backup app Backup app + data Backup app completely with APK & data Backup app completely with APK & data & sync to Drive Backup app + data & sync "Backup the app's APK" "Backup the app's APK & sync to Drive" Backup app & sync Backup applied wallpaper(s) Backup apps Backup apps + data Backup apps + data & Sync in Drive Backup apps & Sync in Drive Backup cache App cache generally does not need to be backed up. Enable this option if you wish to backup app cache. Cache data can be huge for some apps and its backup can result in very large sized backups! Use this option carefully. Backup call logs Backup date Many games store downloadable content externally as OBB files in /Android/obb/ folder. Enable this if you wish to backup this data. "Expansion files can be huge for some games and their backup can result in very large sized backups! Often, these files are needed for the game to run." Backup expansions Backup external data Some apps store media or other downloadable content externally in /Android/data/ folder. Enable this if you wish to backup this data. External data can be huge for some apps and its backup can result in very large sized backups! Use this option carefully. Folder location Backup items Backup messages Backup mode Backup & restore Backup selected On-device backup Backup storage location Backup successful Backup synced in Drive Current backup on the device is synced in your Google Drive. Backup to cloud Backup to local Installed apps with older backups Backup version Batch backup Batch delete backups Batch restore Batch sync backups to Drive Batch uninstall Bluetooth backup Backup saved bluetooth connections on your device. Root required. Uninstalling Swift Backup will remove all backup files stored in your SDCARD!" "You will not be able to use Swift Backup with your SDCARD with device admin disabled!
